newsitem.title: USA: Ciatti's to sell stock/warrant units.
newsitem.headline: Ciatti's to sell stock/warrant units.

text.p: Ciatti's Inc said Tuesday it plans to sell up to three million stock/warrant units at $2.25 each in order to raise funds to increase the number of Bruegger's Bagel Bakery restaurants it owns and operates.
Each unit consists of one share of common stock and a warrant to purchase an additional share of common stock exercisable at $5, the company said.
The company said it filed a registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission regarding the offering, Ciatti's said.
Ciatti's shares were up 1/4 at 1-3/8 Tuesday.
